name: Catball Bounce
description:
Download mobile version from Google Play - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.catflap.catballbalance

----------------------------------------

Uh oh! Catball has found himself stranded in the north pole. Fortunately for him its FLYING FISH season!

Balance Catball on the platform while eating as many fish as possible. Don't let him fall!

----------------------------------------

GAMEPLAY

● BALANCE the cat by tilting your device!
● TAP the screen to do an extra jump!
● COLLECT fish bones to unlock new costumes!

FEATURES

● CUSTOMIZE - Customize your Catball with loads of unlockable costumes!
● ACHIEVEMENTS - Unlock Google Play achievements!
● LEADERBOARDS - Challenge your friends on the leaderboards!
● DAILY REWARDS - Play every day to unlock rewards

COMING SOON

● MORE COSTUMES
● NEW THEMES
● MORE CAT CUSTOMIZATION

(There are no microtransactions in the game and only optional adverts)
